summary: Top, skirt, stockings, watch and sweatband from Lollipop Chainsaw.
descriptionHtml:
[heading]Description[/heading]
To the best of my abilities I've recreated the outfit from Lollipop Chainsaw for Skyrim. This Mod includes the following.

Lollipop Top:
[list]
[*]3x Leather
[*]4x Leather Strips
[*]Temper 1x Leather
[/list]

Lollipop Skirt:
[list]
[*]3x Leather
[*]4x Leather Strips
[*]Temper 1x Leather
[/list]

Lollipop Stockings (Right and Left):
[list]
[*]2x Leather
[*]2x Leather Strips
[*]Temper 1x Leather
[/list]

Lollipop Stockings (Right):
[list]
[*]1x Leather
[*]1x Leather Strips
[*]Temper 1x Leather
[/list]

Lollipop Stockings (Left):
[list]
[*]1x Leather
[*]1x Leather Strips
[*]Temper 1x Leather
[/list]

Lollipop Watch:
[list]
[*]2x Dwarven Cogs
[*]2x Leather Strips
[/list]

Lollipop Sweatband:
[list]
[*]2x Leather Strips
[/list]

Lollipop Sneakers):
[list]
[*]2x Leather
[*]2x Leather Strips
[/list]

[heading]Updates[/heading]
1.4 - Added Sneakers
1.3 - Added Watch, Sweatband and Chest that contains all of the Lollipop items.
1.2 - Stockings now cover the feet and have options for right only, left only or both.
1.1 - Fix for Belt when weight > 27 and weight < 100. Thanks to Steparu for the heads up.
1.0 - Initial Release


[heading]MIGHT be coming soon[/heading]
[list]
[*]UNPB BBP version
[*]Chainsaw Weapon
[/list]


[heading]Recommended[/heading]
Osare Underwear - UNP - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14294]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14294[/url] by anano
Dimonized UNP female body - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709[/url] by dimon99


[heading]Install[/heading]
Extract the archive to your Skyrim game folder.


[heading]Uninstall[/heading]
Uncheck the TMRLollipop data file in the launcher.
Delete:
- TMRLollipop.esp from your Data folder
- Skyrim\Data\meshes\Cosplay\Lollipop folder
- Skyrim\Data\textures\Cosplay\Lollipop folder


[heading]Creation Kit Biped Object Info[/heading]
Top - 46 (Chest primary or outergarment)
Skirt - 49 (Pelvis primary or outergarment)
Stockings Both - 54 (leg secondary or undergarment or left leg)
Stockings Right - 53 (leg primary or outergarment or right leg)
Stockings Left - 54 (leg secondary or undergarment or left leg)
Wrist Watch - 58 (arm secondary or undergarment or left arm)
Wrist Sweatband - 59 (arm primary or outergarment or right arm)
Sneakers - 37 (Feet)


[heading]Credits[/heading]
Bethesda for Skyrim and the CK
author: ThomasR100

files.name: Lollipop Chainsaw Outfit - UNP 1dot3
files.changelogHtml:
Added Lollipop Watch
Added Lollipop Sweatband
Added Chest in Whiterun containing all of the Lollipop items.
